title: Decoding the Omicron Panic
sub_head: Covid overkill is bad for everybody except the politicians.
body:
In the first months of Covid-19, I recalled a speech by Gen. Omar Bradley before D-Day explaining to his troops why politicians back home were suddenly tripping over each other to give interviews to newspapers exaggerating the pending bloodbath.
His point perfectly explains this weekâ€™s Omicron reaction.
